title: Riot will never find this thread
body:
Guys we have to keep this thread a secret from all Rito employees as I think one of them is a sniper.

Ok everyone keep your voices down and stay low so that they wont find us.

{{champion:9}}  (Tip toe around)

replies.body:
I believe Riot has secret connections to the Illuminati

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hkj2clhzGXs
Gonna find a recent Red post and reply to it asking them to check this link out.
